::: {.section}
Upload Torrents {#585}
===============

A session-based HTTP request handler for HTTPServer. UploadTorrents
saves .torrent files that are uploaded to it as POST data and stores the
number of .torrent files save to a file \"meta.txt\".
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: {.section}
